Package com.transportSys.connection

Class dbConnection

java.lang.Object
com.transportSys.connection.dbConnection
public class dbConnection extends Object
A utility class to manage database connections.

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the database.
      Returns:
      A Connection object representing the database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the URL is null.
